title: Tesla CEO Elon Musk buys near 10% stake in Twitter
content:
A new SEC filing revealed that Elon Musk, better known as CEO of Tesla and SpaceX, invested almost $3 billion in Twitter and now owns almost 10% of the social media platform.

more…

The post Tesla CEO Elon Musk buys near 10% stake in Twitter appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A new SEC filing revealed that Elon Musk, better known as CEO of Tesla and SpaceX, invested almost $3 billion in Twitter and now owns almost 10% of the social media platform. Musk, the richest man in the world, famously doesn’t have many investments. While most billionaires have most of their assets linked to a […]
